title: Raw Brussels sprouts salad
ingredients: ['For the dressing', '1 shallot, minced', '60ml cider vinegar', '60ml sunflower oil', '2 tablespoons Dijon mustard', '1/2 teaspoon honey', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/4 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', 'For the salad', '535g Brussels sprouts, trimmed, halved and sliced', '2 apples, cored and thinly sliced', '60g dried cranberries', '30g sliced almonds', '50g sunflower seeds', '45g pumpkin seeds']
